name: Detective Sherlock Pug - Hidden Object
detailed_description:
The shadow of the evil Skindiver has fallen upon Oddopolis. The city police don't know what to do. Detective Sherlock Pug has decided to call on superheroes for aid.
Become a comic-book detective's right-hand man. Solve an unusual case by finding and defeating a dangerous villain.

Key features:

  • An explosive combination of comic book, mystery and humor.
  • Engaging story with colorful characters.
  • Feel like a superhero.
  • Witty, likeable characters.
  • Atmospheric music.
